file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-24-01-04 - COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT (CMU) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT (CMU) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Communication Management Unit (CMU). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-01-000-801-A (CMU) - REMOVAL COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-01-400-801-A (CMU) - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-24-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 2. COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT (CMU) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the CMU. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM 06-42-01/101 - ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 213 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the Aircraft is deenergized ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) Open access door 113CZ (AMM 06-42-01/101). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the knurled nuts (3) which attach the CMU (1) to the mounting tray. (2) Carefully remove the CMU (1) from the mounting tray (2). (3) Install protection caps to the electric connectors. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU Communication Management Unit (CMU) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 3. COMMUNICATION MANAGEMENT UNIT (CMU) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the CMU. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM 06-42-01/101 - CMU - FUNCTIONAL TEST WITH A PORTABLE AMM TASK 23-24-00-700-801-A/500 ACARS TEST STATION (PATS) CMU - FUNCTIONAL TEST WITH AN ACARS AMM TASK 23-24-00-700-802-A/500 GROUND STATION AMM TASK 23-24-01-470-801-A/200 CMU SOFTWARE - UPLOADING AMM TASK 23-24-01-750-801-A/200 CMU SOFTWARE VERSION - CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 213 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the forward electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the protection caps from the electric connectors. (2) Carefully install the CMU (1) onto the mounting tray (2). (3) Tighten the knurled nuts (3) to attach the CMU to the mounting tray (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-24-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If it is a new unit, load the applicable software for the CMU. Refer to AMM TASK 23-24-01-470-801-A/200. (2) Do the check of the CMU Software Version ( AMM TASK 23-24-01-750-801-A/200). (3) Do the CMU operational test ( AMM TASK 23-24-00-700-801-A/500 or AMM TASK 23-24-00-700-802-A/500). (4) Close access door 113CZ (AMM 06-42-01/101). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-24-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
